body.name: AWOW Kids Tablet Android 13, 8GB RAM 128GB ROM, 10 inch Tablets for Kids Toddler with Drop-Proof Case and Stylus, Parental Control, Dual Camera, WiFi/BT, Child Tablets Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 18 mins
features: 【Android 13 and 8GB RAM 128GB ROM】AWOW kids tablet is equipped with the latest Android 13 system, which is faster, smoother, and safer than Android 12. With a quad-core processor, 8GB(4+4) RAM, 128GB ROM, SD card expandable up to 512GB. 10.1 inch IPS HD display. It can meet the diverse learning and entertainment needs of children. Android 13 creates a user-friendly interface that prioritizes privacy protection, while also providing kid-friendly themes and easy-to-use operations.

【Kids Tablet with Kidoz APP】Looking to foster your child's creativity and imagination in a fun and engaging way? KIDOZ - the app pre-installed on our tablet for kids. With a wide selection of age-appropriate creative content and educational apps, your child will never run out of opportunities to learn and play. Plus, with the ability for parents to download the specific apps their child desires, you can tailor your child's learning experience to their individual interests.

【Enhanced Parental Control】By enabling the kid's mode, you can create and personalize profiles for your little ones, carefully curate the content they have access to, and set limits on their screen time. Parents can easily exit the child mode using a secure password. As your child grows, you can adjust the security settings to suit their changing needs. With these advanced parental control features, you can create a worry-free and enjoyable digital environment for your children.

【Kid-Proof Case and Stylus Pen】Crafted from safe and non-toxic EVA foam bubble material, this case is designed to protect the tablet from even the most disastrous drops and spills. Plus, its 360° adjustable stand ensures that the tablet stays secure, no matter what angle your child is viewing it from. And with our stylus pen, your child can write and draw to their heart's content, providing endless entertainment and creativity for your child.

【Perfect Gift for Kids】Whether it's Christmas, New Year, Easter or a special birthday, our tablet PC is the perfect choice for any occasion. And thanks to its video and voice call capabilities, you and your kids can enjoy hours of quality parent-child time, whether you're playing games, learning new things, or simply chatting online. And with our 1 year warranty, as well as lifetime technology support, you can be confident that you're making a smart investment.
body.description: AWOW Funtab 1001 Kids Tablet AWOW Funtab 1001 Kids Tablet can easily switch between Kids Mode and Parent Mode with password set by parents. Under Kids Mode: kids could play all kinds of age-appropriate games safety and learning fun in KIDOZ. Under Parent Mode: parents could set limits to Kids Mode and use this kids tablet as a normal tablet with pre-installed Google Play. Package List 10.1 inch kids tablet *1 Exclusive Kid Proof Case *1 Active Pen *1 User manual *1 Adapter *1

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AWOW Android 13 Kids Tablet with EVA Shockproof Case

AWOW Funtab 1001 Kids Tablet AWOW Funtab 1001 Kids Tablet can easily switch between Kids Mode and Parent Mode with password set by parents. Under Kids Mode: kids could play all kinds of age-appropriate games safety and learning fun in KIDOZ. Under Parent Mode: parents could set limits to Kids Mode and use this kids tablet as a normal tablet with pre-installed Google Play. Package List 10.1 inch kids tablet *1 Exclusive Kid Proof Case *1 Active Pen *1 User manual *1 Adapter *1 Technical Details Android 13 KIDOZ Pre-installed 10.1 inch IPS HD Display 8GB(4+4) RAM; 128GB ROM Rear camera 8.0Mpx; Front camera 2.0Mpx 5000MAh Battery Support 2.4G WiFi only; Bluetooth 4.2 1x Micro USB port, 1x Micro TF slot

Android 13 tablet for kids, KIDOZ pre-installed This Android kids tablet is pre-installed with KIDOZ, there are thousands of kid-friendly apps in KIDOZ Store. And parents could download apps in Google Play in Parent Mode and add to Child Mode. It's also pre-installed with Google Play, could be used as a normal tablet. Make Learning More Fun This kids tablet is effective to cultivate kids interest in learning, it comes with a stylus pen and there are lots of learning apps in KIDOZ Store. These apps can help children learning more while playing which make it easily for children to learn and draw, making learning more fun! 360° Adjustable Stand & Kid-proof Case 360° adjustable stand for hands-free viewing, supporting the tablet from all angles. It's very convenient for kids to watch video or read with a suitable angle. The durable kid-proof case protects your tablet from bumps and drops and the portable design makes easy to carry.

To ensure the safety of your children, KIDOZ comes with a child lock that prevents them from exiting the safe environment.In Safe Mode – your child will be safe inside KIDOZ and external links and in-app purchases will be blocked as long as the device is not turned off.In Extra Safe Mode – KIDOZ will act as the default launcher while the app is running, and even if you power off your device – when you turn it back on, your child will still be safe inside KIDOZ.Select the safety level you want for your child by tapping the Lock icon and choosing the relevant setting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a five year old
reviews.reviewText: Kiddo beats the heck out of this device and it's still ticking. Screen is responsive, graphics are fine, no issues. Amazing what you can get now for this price. Best Christmas present hands down, no regrets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My grandson loves it ! Had a battery issue sent it back to the company , sent me a brand new one . They were very professional and fast .Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My 8 year old loves it!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter received this tablet for Christmas. She has used it daily since. She loves everything about it. About 2 weeks ago, it stopped charging. It would say it was charging but never actually would despite using different chargers. Contacted AWOW customer service and received a message back from Martin within a few hours. After troubleshooting the tablet, he told us to send it back to him and he would send us a brand new replacement. We received it today and it is the exact same tablet. Very happy with the product and the customer service is amazing. Thank you so much, Martin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice to play with.
reviews.reviewText: Xmas gift not in use yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not such good product
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two for my grandkids, one works great the others is horrible, we have tried to reset, it is difficult to navigate through the screen it only stays on the first page. I sure this was a return and passed on. Will return as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Although we were very pleased with the product, it did break. I contacted the seller and they have been very helpful. I have returned the item to them and they will be sending a replacement once it is received. Their customer service department(Martin) was quick to respond to my request.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excelente Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: The Awow Representative was very helpful in replacing my Grandson Ayer he dropped to the floor and the screen broke up.I spoke with Clyde and she was very helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s an ok tablet bad thing is screen breaks easy case doesn’t protect tablet at all.
reviews.reviewText: It’s a good product the only bad thing is the case protector doesn’t protect the tablet at all, my 3 year old daughter is autistic and she let her first tablet fall on its back I don’t know how the screen cracked. My second tablet they replaced my baby girl was sitting in her chair it fell and hit the corner of the case protector and fell on its back again the screen cracked, I would buy this tablet either for me or my 16 year old but for my 3 year old nope mind you the second tablet I had bought a screen protector and it still cracked, I took out the screen protector to make sure it was just the screen protector that cracked and nope it was the screen that cracked as well. Honestly like I said I would buy it for my 16 year old or myself..
Gift purchase for my two grandsons was a hit. They both loved them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I would buy again but the extra £ for colour is wrong. I got the charger cables, that we can leave the ends in the tablets, and wave the magnetic cable at them, for it to connect together to charge. A little helpful pair of hands were grabbing the cable and in danger of snapping the charger portal.
Per un bambino di 4-5 anni, più che valido.
